relation: Added ability to directly download / send to plastic vizier tables from voexplorer
Improved display of annotations in resource table and details pane.
Implemented new list of resourcelists in voexplorer

Query Builder. Reinstated one-touch expansion for split pane. Corrected inability to see diagnostics and history panes. Eliminated Adql/x validation messages in favour of AdqlCompiler messages. Fixes 2277.
VoExplorer sends and accepts bibcode plastic messages - for paperscope integration
Altered tables to have white background in metal LAF
Fixed construction of UI code so it's always on eventDispatchThread. This fixes some of the problems seen under Windows / Java 6
Updated file chooser dialogue to use new FileExplorer UI
Indicate 'handoff' with a transient popup notification when plastic message is sent to another application
